item.title: 中国推动取消关税以结束美国贸易战
item.description: 中国周四呼吁取消美国的所有 "单边 "关税，因为有迹象表明特朗普政府可能会缓和与中国政府的贸易战。【原文：China called for all "unilateral" U.S. tariffs to be cancelled on Thursday, as signs emerged that the Trump administration may de-escalate its trade war with Beijing.】

item.title: 默克公司利润增长，关税成本为 2 亿美元
item.description: 默克公司周四表示，第一季度调整后利润增长了 7%，原因是成本下降帮助抵消了销售额 2% 的下降，这反映出由于需求下滑，该公司 1 月份决定暂停向中国运输加卫苗。【原文：Merck on Thursday said its first-quarter adjusted profit rose 7% as lower costs helped offset a 2% decline in sales, reflecting a January decision to pause shipments of its Gardasil vaccine to China due to a downturn in demand.】

item.title: 美国 那是死猫反弹吗？
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today.】

item.title: 投资者评估贸易发展和财报，美股期货下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周四下跌，投资者在评估特朗普政府反复无常的贸易政策的最新曲折以及众多喜忧参半的企业业绩时，短暂的股市反弹嘎然而止。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Thursday, with a brief equity rally fizzling out as investors assessed the latest twists and turns in the Trump administration's erratic trade policy, and a bevy of mixed corporate results.】

item.title: 由于减值费用，日产汽车目前预计年度亏损将扩大至至少 49 亿美元
item.description: 日产汽车（Nissan Motor）周四表示，由于该陷入困境的汽车制造商在重组过程中计提了减值费用，该公司目前预计在截至 3 月的财政年度中将出现 7,000-7,500 亿日元（49.1-52.6 亿美元）的净亏损。【原文：Nissan Motor on Thursday said it now expects a net loss of 700-750 billion yen ($4.91 billion-$5.26 billion) for the financial year that ended in March due to impairment charges as the troubled automaker restructures.】

item.title: 陶氏报告第一季度亏损，扩大欧洲资产审查范围
item.description: 受价格下跌、能源和原料成本上升的影响，化工企业陶氏公司周四公布第一季度亏损，而去年同期为盈利。【原文：Chemicals firm Dow Inc reported a first-quarter loss on Thursday versus a year-ago profit, hurt by lower prices and higher energy and feedstock costs, and said it is expanding the review of its European assets.】

item.title: 共和党工作组组长希望美联储不受政治影响，包括特朗普的影响
item.description: 一位负责审查美联储货币政策的共和党议员希望美国国会通过使央行免受政治影响（包括来自唐纳德-特朗普总统的影响）来帮助稳定金融市场。【原文：A Republican lawmaker tasked with scrutinizing Federal Reserve monetary policy wants the U.S. Congress to help stabilize financial markets by insulating the central bank from political influence, including from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 肯塔基州农民遭遇贸易战和历史性洪灾双重打击
item.description: 今年春天，肯塔基州农民德鲁-兰利（Drew Langley）早早开始种植大豆，希望提高产量，以缓解美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与中国的贸易战导致世界第一大进口国需求成疑后大豆价格下滑所带来的影响。【原文：Kentucky farmer Drew Langley got an early start planting soybeans this spring, hoping to boost yields to help soothe the sting of slumping prices after U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war with China put demand from the world's top importer in doubt.】

item.title: 如果市场需要央行的帮助，分析师将利用美联储工具包进行博弈
item.description: 特朗普政府波澜不惊的政策出台令市场参与者感到不安，他们正在努力摸索，如果资产价格失控，需要美国中央银行来稳定，美联储会怎么做。【原文：Market participants unsettled by the Trump administration's choppy policy rollout are working to game out what the Federal Reserve would do if asset prices spiral out of control and require stabilization by the U.S. central bank.】

item.title: 百事公司在贸易战动荡中下调年度利润预期
item.description: 百事公司周四下调了年度核心利润预期，因为这家汽水和零食巨头正在努力应对唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的贸易政策和供应链中断所带来的不确定性。【原文：PepsiCo cut its annual core profit forecast on Thursday, as the soda and snacks giant grapples with the uncertainty fueled by President Donald Trump's erratic trade policy and disruptions to its supply chain.】

item.title: 高盛首席经济学家：美元还有下跌空间
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）首席经济学家Jan Hatzius表示，美元因美国关税不确定性和经济衰退担忧而遭受重创，还将继续下跌。【原文：The dollar, battered and bruised by U.S. tariff uncertainty and recession fears, has much further to fall, Goldman Sachs chief economist Jan Hatzius says.】

item.title: 他的医生说，教皇方济各很快就去世了，没有痛苦
item.description: 教皇方济各的医疗团队负责人在周四发表的采访中说，教皇方济各于周一上午因意外中风而迅速去世，没有遭受过度的痛苦，医生也无法挽救他的生命。【原文：Pope Francis died quickly on Monday morning from an unexpected stroke without suffering undue pain, and there was nothing that doctors could have done to save his life, the head of the pontiff's medical team said in interviews published on Thursday.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔裁员后，法国将寻求中国钢铁进口保护
item.description: 法国政府发言人索菲-普里马斯（Sophie Primas）周四表示，法国和其他欧洲国家将推动采取措施，保护欧洲钢铁工业免受中国进口产品的冲击。【原文：France and other European countries will push for measures to protect the European steel industry against Chinese imports, French government spokesperson Sophie Primas said on Thursday.】

item.title: Databricks 将增加招聘，在印度投资 2.5 亿美元用于人工智能扩张
item.description: 数据分析公司Databricks周四表示，将加大在印度的招聘力度，并投资超过2.5亿美元，加倍重视印度的人工智能人才库，并增加人工智能投资。【原文：Data analytics firm Databricks said on Thursday it will ramp up hiring and invest more than $250 million in India, doubling down on the country's artificial intelligence talent pool and growing AI investments.】

item.title: Adobe 为其 Firefly 应用程序添加了来自 OpenAI 和 Google 的人工智能模型
item.description: Adobe 公司周四表示，将在其 Firefly 应用程序中加入 OpenAI 和 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司的图像生成人工智能模型，并将该应用程序引入移动设备。【原文：Adobe said on Thursday it is adding image-generation artificial intelligence models from OpenAI and Alphabet's Google to its Firefly app and bringing the app to mobile devices.】

item.title: 雀巢与竞争对手放缓美国涨价幅度，争夺焦虑的美国消费者
item.description: 全球贸易战考验着日用品和包装食品制造商在杂货店的定价能力，它们正在放缓美国的提价幅度，以避免美国购物者转向零售商价格更低的自有品牌。【原文：Household goods and packaged food makers are easing U.S. price increases to avoid losing American shoppers to retailers' less expensive private-label brands as a global trade war tests the limits of their pricing power at grocery stores.】

item.title: 受关税影响的中国出口商不愿响应政府号召进行本地销售
item.description: 中国政府呼吁出口商寻找本地买家的呼声越来越高。【原文：Beijing has made increasingly louder calls on exporters to find local buyers.】

item.title: 受关税影响，LG 电子考虑提高部分产品价格
item.description: LG电子公司周四表示，为应对美国关税，该公司正在考虑提高部分产品的价格，同时也在考虑将家电生产转移到美国的方案。【原文：LG Electronics said on Thursday it is considering price increases for some products in response to U.S. tariffs and is also reviewing its options for shifting production of home appliances to the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道：中国 Leapmotor 将为红旗提供电动车平台，也在与法拉利谈判
item.description: Leapmotor 与中国国有汽车制造商一汽达成了一项协议，将提供一个电动汽车平台，用于推动红旗汽车的海外销售。【原文：Leapmotor has struck a deal with Chinese state-owned automaker FAW to deliver an electric vehicle platform that will be used to drive overseas sales for Hongqi, an emerging national champion, executives from both companies said.】

item.title: 罗氏寻求与特朗普政府直接对话，减免美国关税
item.description: 瑞士制药商罗氏公司正在通过直接谈判向美国政府申请进口关税豁免，理由是其运往美国的产品被其出口的美国产药品和诊断产品所抵消。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Roche is petitioning the U.S. government in direct talks for import tariff exemptions, arguing the products it ships into the United States are offset by its exports of U.S.-made drugs and diagnostics.】

item.title: 第一季度销售额降幅超过预期，开云集团股价下跌 5.42
item.description: 周四开盘，开云集团（Kering）股价下跌 5.42%，此前该公司公布的第一季度销售额低于分析师预期。【原文：Shares of Kering dropped 5.42% at market open on Thursday, after the company reported first-quarter sales that came in below analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 中国商务部就关税影响与外企举行会谈
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，已与80多家外国在华企业和商会举行会议，讨论美国加征关税对外国企业在华投资和经营的影响。【原文：China's Commerce Ministry said on Thursday that it had held a meeting with more than 80 foreign companies and chambers in China to discuss the impact of U.S. tariffs on investment and the operation of foreign firms in the country.】

item.title: 解说：中国正在限制矿产出口。中国的出口管制制度是如何运作的？
item.description: 中国一直在加强对矿产开采和提炼的控制，将清洁能源、芯片制造和国防所必需的金属列入出口管制清单，扰乱了全球供应，导致价格飙升。【原文：China has been flexing its control over the mining and refining of minerals by adding metals essential for clean energy, chipmaking and defence to its export control list, disrupting global supply and sending prices soaring.】

item.title: 外国汽车制造商销量下滑，保时捷在中国也找不到方向
item.description: 在今年的上海车展上，在中国的外国汽车制造商面临着一个日益紧迫的挑战--在其国内竞争对手以迅猛的速度生产华而不实、价格低廉的电动汽车的同时，如何重新赢得中国买家的青睐？【原文：Foreign automakers in China face an increasingly urgent challenge at this year's Shanghai auto show - winning back Chinese buyers while their domestic rivals churn out slick, affordable electric vehicles at a relentless pace.】

item.title: 英国贝尔福比蒂公司获得德克萨斯州 8.89 亿美元高速公路合同
item.description: 英国建筑和基础设施集团 Balfour Beatty 周四表示，它已从得克萨斯州交通部获得一份价值 8.89 亿美元的合同，用于重建 30 号州际公路的部分路段。【原文：British construction and infrastructure group Balfour Beatty said on Thursday it had secured a contract worth $889 million from the Texas Department of Transportation to reconstruct part of Interstate 30 highway.】

item.title: 联合利华第一季度基本销售额增长超出预期
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）周四公布的第一季度基本销售额增长超出预期，并重申了 2025 年全年业绩展望。【原文：Unilever beat estimates for first-quarter underlying sales growth on Thursday and reaffirmed its full-year 2025 outlook.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车任命弗雷德里克-汉森（Fredrik Hansson）为新任首席财务官
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周四表示，已任命弗雷德里克-汉森（Fredrik Hansson）为新任首席财务官（CFO）。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars said on Thursday it had appointed Fredrik Hansson as new chief financial officer (CFO).】

item.title: 斯托龙斯基增持超过 25% 的股份，Revolut 利润飙升至 15 亿美元
item.description: Revolut公司周四表示，由于这家金融科技公司在加密货币交易浪潮中乘胜追击，并从利率和卡费中赚取了更多利润，该公司去年的税前利润激增149%，达到11亿英镑（约合14.6亿美元）。【原文：Revolut's pretax profit surged 149% last year to 1.1 billion pounds ($1.46 billion) as the financial technology firm rode a wave in crypto trading and earned more from interest rates and card fees, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本投资者上周转为海外债券净买家
item.description: 在截至 4 月 19 日的一周内，日本投资者成为海外债券的净买家，因为美国债券市场在本月早些时候的大幅下挫后有所回升。【原文：Japanese investors were net buyers of overseas bonds in the week through April 19, as U.S. bond markets recovered somewhat after a heavy selloff earlier this month.】

item.title: 惠誉 "密切关注 "韩国如何应对地缘政治挑战
item.description: 全球信用评级机构惠誉表示，它正在 "密切 "关注韩国在中美全球贸易战中如何应对地缘政治挑战。【原文：Global credit ratings agency Fitch said it was "quite closely" watching how South Korea manages geopolitical challenges amid a global trade war between the United States and China.】
